Queries.ReadAllInformation: SELECT * FROM crudoperation.crudapplication WHERE IsActive = 1 ORDER BY CASE WHEN @SortBy = 'UserName' THEN UserName WHEN @SortBy = 'EmailId' THEN EmailId WHEN @SortBy = 'Salary' THEN Salary WHEN @SortBy = 'Gender' THEN Gender ELSE UserID END @SortDirection LIMIT @PageSize OFFSET @Offset;
Queries.UpdateAllInformationById: Update crudoperation.crudapplication SET UserName=@UserName, EmailId=@EmailId, MobileNumber=@MobileNumber, Gender=@Gender, Salary=@Salary WHERE UserID = @UserID;
